text: Devin Oliver (born July 2, 1992) is an American professional basketball player for Arel Üniversitesi Büyükçekmece of the Turkish Basketbol Süper Ligi (BSL). He played college basketball for Dayton. ==College career== Oliver played four seasons for the Dayton Flyers. Oliver led the Flyer’s in rebounding (7.4) and assists (2.3), and was second in scoring (11.2) that season.Devin Oliver Signs with Celtics Summer Team ==Professional career== After going undrafted in the 2014 NBA draft, Oliver joined the Boston Celtics for the 2014 NBA Summer League.Devin Oliver signs with Celtics summer team. In July 2014, Oliver signed his first professional contract with Belgium club Limburg United.Dayton’s Oliver signs with first division team in Belgium. In August 2015, Oliver signed with Israeli club Maccabi Kiryat Gat. On December 1, 2015, he parted ways with Maccabi Kiryat Gat. In March 2016, he signed with SPO Rouen Basket of France for the rest of the season. On August 22, 2016, he signed a one-year deal with Slovenian club Union Olimpija.Olimpija lands Devin Oliver. On July 18, 2017, he re-signed with Olimpija for one more season.Devin Oliver ostaja Zmaj! In July 2018, Oliver signed with Turkish club Banvit.[ https://sportando.basketball/en/turkey/bsl/279829/devin-oliver-inks-with- banvit.html Devin Oliver inks with Banvit.] On 29 January 2019, he has signed a half year contract with s.Oliver Würzburg. On June 27, 2019, he has signed 1-year deal contract with Nanterre 92 of the LNB Pro A. On August 3, 2020, Oliver signed a deal with Arel Üniversitesi Büyükçekmece of the Turkish Basketbol Süper Ligi (BSL) for the 2020-2021 season. === The Basketball Tournament (TBT) (2017–present) === In the summer of 2017, Oliver played in The Basketball Tournament on ESPN for the Broad Street Brawlers. He competed for the $2 million prize, and for the Brawlers, he averaged 9 rebounds per game. Oliver helped the Brawlers reach the second round, only then losing to Team Colorado 111-95. ==References== ==External links== * Eurobasket.com profile * FIBA profile * ESPN profile * Union Olimpija profile Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American expatriate basketball people in Belgium Category:American expatriate basketball people in Germany Category:American expatriate basketball people in Israel Category:American expatriate basketball people in France Category:American expatriate basketball people in Slovenia Category:American expatriate basketball people in Turkey Category:American men's basketball players Category:Bandırma B.İ.K. players Category:Basketball players from Michigan Category:Dayton Flyers men's basketball players Category:KK Olimpija players Category:Limburg United players Category:Maccabi Kiryat Gat B.C. players Category:Nanterre 92 players Category:S.Oliver Würzburg players Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Kalamazoo, Michigan
title: Devin Oliver
